title: The Ultimate Guide to the Best (Yet Boring) Home Office Gadget Gifts
sub_head: Give the gift of work-from-home productivity, from laptop stands to USB-C dongles to 4K monitors
body:
The best gadget I bought this year was a $50 piece of metal whose sole job is to prop up another piece of metal (my laptop). Actually, no, it was definitely a computer monitor. Scratch that, it was an Ethernet cord the length of a fire hose.
If you had told me a year ago that the must-have gadgets of 2020 were actually the most boring office gadgets of 2002, Iâ€™d have told you to slow down on the wine coolers. Yet here we are.
In...
